Items.Title: Application no. 20085154 TCM, pursuant to §20-226 of the Administrative Code of the City of New York, concerning the petition of. Eisen and Son, Inc., d/b/a Lasagna Ristorante, to continue to maintain and operate an unenclosed sidewalk café located at 196 Eighth Avenue, Borough of Manhattan, Council District no. 3.
